role.descr: causer of something becoming bad (rarely or never occuring)

example.name: usually with just end point
example.text: Demonstrations-1 are particularly apt *trace*-1 to degenerate into criminal conduct when they leave the site of the grievance and become mobile.

example.name: explicit start state
example.text: Customers degenerate from borrowers to savers/investors.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'degenerate' based on sentences in wsj and automaticexpansion via verbnet.
